episodes.summary: Explore the high-stakes world of AI as we discuss Anthropic’s public accusations of corporate espionage and the shifting venture capital landscape where investor loyalty is a thing of the past. This episode also dives into the rise of autonomous AI agents—from their potential to go "rogue" in your inbox to new tools that give users an "AI kill switch" for better digital control.
keyTopics: Anthropic distillation attack allegations against Chinese labs
Venture capital firms backing both OpenAI and Anthropic
OpenClaw AI agent rogue behavior security incident
OpenAI enterprise agent partnerships with consulting firms
Salesforce Slackbot transformation into autonomous AI agent
Anthropic Cowork desktop agent for local files
Railway AI-native cloud infrastructure hundred million funding
Firefox AI Kill Switch feature for user control
